org.pac4j.play.java

Class UserProfileController<P extends org.pac4j.core.profile.CommonProfile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • org.pac4j.play.java.UserProfileController<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class UserProfileController<P extends org.pac4j.core.profile.CommonProfile>
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This controller is an easy way to get the user profile and some default injected components (configuration and data store).
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
